Title: Diary of a Mad Housewife
Cast: Richard Benjamin, Frank Langella, Carrie Snodgress, Lorraine Cullen, Frannie Michel, Lee Addoms, Peter Dohanos, Katherine Meskill, Leonard Elliott, Valma, Hilda Haynes, Donald Symington, Alley Mills, Alice Cooper, Michael Bruce
Plot: A housewife with an abusive husband has an affair with a writer. Tina Balser is a bored New York housewife-mother married to Jonathan, a pompous, social-climbing lawyer who ridicules her in front of their children, criticizing everything she does or wears. She begins an affair with George Prager, a dashing, successful and blatantly sadistic writer. Finally after George has tormented Tina in much the same manner Jonathan has, and has been unfaithful to boot, she goes back to her husband and begins group therapy. Written by alfiehitchie
Keywords: writer, abusive husband, lawyer, housewife, group therapy
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 8 nominations.
Actors: Richard Benjamin, Frank Langella, Carrie Snodgress
Description: Directed by Frank Perry.  With Richard Benjamin, Frank Langella, Carrie Snodgress, Lorraine Cullen. A housewife with an abusive husband has an affair with a writer.
